articles.title: Redmi Note 10T 5G With Triple Rear Cameras, MediaTek Dimensity 700 SoC Launched in India: Price, Specific... - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Redmi Note 10T 5G was launched in India on Tuesday with triple rear cameras and the MediaTek Dimensity 700 SoC. The Redmi phone comes as a rebranded Redmi Note 10 5G (Europe) and a rebadged Poco M3 Pro 5G.
articles.content: Redmi Note 10T 5G was launched in India on Tuesday. The new Redmi phone is the fifth model in the Redmi Note 10 series, after Redmi Note 10, Redmi Note 10 Pro, Redmi Note 10 Pro Max, and Redmi Note 1… [+2704 chars]
